# Solution

n = int(input())
s = input()
colors = [0]*n

for i in range(n):
    if i > 0 and s[i] == s[i-1]:
        colors[i] = colors[i-1]
    else:
        colors[i] = colors[i-1]+1

print(colors[-1])
print(*colors)

#https://codeforces.com/contest/1252/problem/C

n = int(input())
s = input()

res = 1
c = [1]

for i in range(1, n):
    if s[i] != s[i-1]:
        res += 1
        c.append(res)
    else:
        c.append(res)

print(res)
print(*c)
